scripts.coverage: rimraf coverage && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel-node.js node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report html -- -t 6000 mocha.config.js tests/*.js && open coverage/index.html
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.jsdoc: node_modules/jsdoc/jsdoc.js -r src/ -d docs --readme readme.md && open docs/index.html
